title: Reichshof Hamburg, A Historic Hotel Located In The Heart Of Hamburg, Today Became The First Curio - A Collection By Hilton Hotel In Europe (Photo: Hilton Worldwide)
text: Reprint Hilton Worldwide today opened the iconic Reichshof Hamburg hotel, adding another exceptional hotel to its growing global brand, Curio - A Collection by Hilton . The grand, central Hamburg hotel, operated by Event Hotelgruppe, is the brand's first hotel in Europe and combines Hanseatic Art-DÃ©co elegance with contemporary design and offers travelers local discoveries and authentic travel experiences at the core of the Curio brand. This Smart News Release features multimedia. View the full release here: http://www.businesswire.com/news/home/20150717005019/en/ Reichshof Hamburg, a historic hotel located in the heart of Hamburg, today became the first Curio - A Collection by Hilton hotel in Europe (Photo: Hilton Worldwide) "The uniqueness and special character of Reichshof Hamburg is a great example of what we seek when hand-picking respected and distinguished hotels for our Curio collection," said Dianna Vaughan, global head, Curio - A Collection by Hilton. "The restored hotel is a favorite among travelers because it beautifully blends the old with the new and captures Hamburg's vibrant energy, while also offering our guests the reassurance and benefits that come with the Hilton name and HHonors loyalty program.""Europe has a wealth of exceptional upscale and luxury independent hotels, appealing to guests seeking more unique travel experiences," said Simon Vincent, president EMEA, Hilton Worldwide. "The Reichshof Hamburg, Hilton Worldwide's newest Curio collection hotel, offers guests the best of both worlds - a hotel that encapsulates the true essence of Hamburg with the advantages of being affiliated with Hilton Worldwide." Located opposite the historic Hamburg Central Railway Station, Reichshof fuses impressive architecture and modern furnishings with personalized hospitality. The hotel's 278 renovated guest rooms, as well as junior and one bedroom suites, offer guests a relaxing haven in lively central Hamburg. The hotel also boasts a 250 meter recreation and fitness facility, where guests can access the fully equipped gym or indulge in luxurious spa treatments. 1 of 3
